Generation VI.X: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
Generation VI.Y: Barbaracle's legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Barbaracle's legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head's orders.

Generation VIII.Sword: Seven Binacle come together to form one Barbaracle. The Binacle that serves as the head gives orders to those serving as the limbs.
Generation VIII.Shield: Having an eye on each palm allows it to keep watch in all directions. In a pinch, its limbs start to act on their own to ensure the enemy's defeat.

Generation VIII.Sword: Route 9 , Dusty Bowl Rolling Fields , West Lake Axewell , Giant's Seat , Stony Wilderness , Giant's Mirror , Dusty Bowl ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Shield: Route 9 , Dusty Bowl Rolling Fields , West Lake Axewell , Giant's Seat , Stony Wilderness , Giant's Mirror , Dusty Bowl ( Max Raid Battle )
Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Loop Lagoon ( Max Raid Battle ) Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure )
